dct_description_sm: compiled from the latest & best authorities by John Melish ; engraved by J. Vallance & H. S. Tanner.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, shoals, state boundaries, water and land routes (e.g.: Pike's), and "Unexplored country."
Decorative cartouche with eagle holding banner reading: E pluribus unum.
"The figures along the Roads denote the distances."
"Entered according to Act of Congress the 6th. day of June 1816."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
